name: Assurely
overview:
Insurance for the collaborative economy. We create risk products for the peer economy.

We are currently testing (private beta) insurance for crowdfunding.

Pledge in confidence on your favorite crowdfunding platforms. Our products offer risk protection for all types of pledge-based and equity-based crowdfunding.

  • Consumer and investor protection: We offer insurance for both pledge and equity crowdfunding platforms.

  • Security for your platform: Allow your users to engage on your platform with full confidence.

  • Trust in your brand: Ensure your community can trust your platform and brand.
